title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: The Duchess of Sussex has said not many people ask if she is OK and admitted living in the public eye as a new mother has been a "struggle". Meghan told journalist and friend Tom Bradby in a new documentary that any woman when pregnant is vulnerable so the amount of attention directed at her made it "really challenging". In a preview of ITV documentary Harry & Meghan: An African Journey, the duchess thanked Bradby for asking how it has been as she said not many people have. Image: News Corp Australia
